# migadu_rewrite (Data Source)

Fetches information about a Migadu rewrite rule.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "migadu_rewrite" "example" {
  domain_name = "example.com"
  name        = "catch-support"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `domain_name` (String) The domain name.
- `name` (String) The name of the rewrite rule.

### Read-Only

- `destinations` (List of String) List of destination email addresses.
- `local_part_rule` (String) The local part matching rule.
- `order_num` (Number) Order number for rule processing.
